DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the difference in preventing a relapse between Betaseron and Avonex. Patients with RRMS currently treated with Avonex will be randomized into 2 equal-size arms; one arm will continue on the standard dose of Avonex; one arm will be converted to Betaseron standard dose.
DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy and Safety Comparison Study of Two Marketed Drugs in Patients With Relapsing-remitting MS
DOC.detailed_description: This study has previously been posted by Berlex, Inc. Berlex, Inc. has been renamed to Bayer HealthCare Pharmaceuticals, Inc.Bayer HealthCare Pharmaceuticals, Inc.is the sponsor of the trial.
DOC.criteria: RRMS patients that are receiving treatment with Avonex 30 Âµg once weekly Primary Progressive or Secondary Progressive MS
